concept.title: Manage Users and Groups
concept.shortdesc: You can also perform user authentication by integrating Eucalyptus with an existing LDAP or Active Directory. This information cannot be changed from Eucalyptus side when LDAP/AD integration is turned on. However, other Eucalyptus-specific information about user, group and account is still stored within the local database of Eucalyptus, including certificates, secret keys and attached policies.
